item.description: A revision of ESV V2 with the voltage regulator removed

item.title: Rebreather Monitoring
item.description: Led the design of the rebreather monitoring system for our submarine project

item.description: My first actual attempt at building an ESC. A shrunk down revision of the first.

item.description: My first attempt to make a sensor-less ESC for my drone

item.title: Drone ESC
item.description: Making a custom electronic speed controller for my drone’s motors

item.title: Scoreboard
item.description: Made a small display board to keep score of a game

item.title: Telemetry
item.description: Developed a general purpose wireless communication system to be used in future projects for HPVDT

item.title: Bus Stop Checker
item.description: Made a small system to check online for buses around my home at the press of a button.

item.description: Created the electronics system for what would have been our ASME 2020 race bike entry. A combination of TITAN and Zephyr.

item.description: My first attempt at building a ‘steer by video’ system from scratch for one of our speed bikes

item.title: Zephyr
item.description: Designed the electronics system for Zephy, HPVDT’s entry to ASME 2019

item.title: Arbiter Lighting
item.description: Prepared a hardware-only lighting system based on what was planned for the team’s previous vehicle, Tempest. My first PCB!

item.title: Entry Fob Replication
item.description: Reverse engineered and replicated an access fob for my residence at the time

item.description: Revised the existing show seat used at demos to have its set points easily reconfigured with software. My first embedded electronics project!
